trans-unit.source: Emulates a Visual Basic 6.0 <see langword="Data Environment" /> in applications that have been upgraded from Visual Basic 6.0.
trans-unit.target: 在已从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级的应用程序中模拟 Visual Basic 6.0 <see langword="Data Environment" />。

trans-unit.source: In Visual Basic 6.0, data-bound forms were automatically created when you dragged database elements from a `Data Environment` onto a form.
trans-unit.target: 在 Visual Basic 6.0 中，数据绑定窗体自动创建拖动数据库中的元素时`Data Environment`拖到窗体。

trans-unit.source: The `Data Environment` handled all the mapping between Visual Basic 6.0 and the ADO data layer.
trans-unit.target: `Data Environment`处理 Visual Basic 6.0 和 ADO 数据层之间的所有映射。

trans-unit.source: When an application is upgraded to [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)], a `BaseDataEnvironment` is created to enable the ADO-related code.
trans-unit.target: 在应用程序升级到[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]、`BaseDataEnvironment`创建以启用 ADO 相关代码。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseDataEnvironment" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseDataEnvironment" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: When an application is upgraded to [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)], a `BaseDataEnvironment` is created to enable the ADO-related code.
trans-unit.target: 在应用程序升级到[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]、`BaseDataEnvironment`创建以启用 ADO 相关代码。

trans-unit.source: None.
trans-unit.target: 无。

trans-unit.source: This method is not implemented in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseDataEnvironment" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 此方法未在 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseDataEnvironment" /> 类中实现。

trans-unit.source: This method is not implemented in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseDataEnvironment> class.
trans-unit.target: 此方法未在 <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseDataEnvironment> 类中实现。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of <see langword="ADODB.Command" /> objects for use in an application upgraded from Visual Basic 6.0.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see langword="ADODB.Command" /> 对象的集合以便在从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级的应用程序中使用。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of <see langword="ADODB.Command" /> objects for use in an application upgraded from Visual Basic 6.0.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see langword="ADODB.Command" /> 对象的集合以便在从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级的应用程序中使用。

trans-unit.source: A collection of <see langword="ADODB.Command" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="ADODB.Command" /> 对象的集合。

trans-unit.source: When an application is upgraded to [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)], a `BaseDataEnvironment` is created to enable the ADO-related code.
trans-unit.target: 在应用程序升级到[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]、`BaseDataEnvironment`创建以启用 ADO 相关代码。

trans-unit.source: A Visual Basic 6.0 <see langword="Variant" /> that contains the <see langword="ADODB.Command" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: 一个 Visual Basic 6.0 <see langword="Variant" />，其中包含 <see langword="ADODB.Command" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of <see langword="ADODB.Command" /> objects for use in an application upgraded from Visual Basic 6.0.

trans-unit.target: <see langword="ADODB.Command" /> 对象的集合。

trans-unit.target: <see langword="ADODB.Connection" /> 对象的集合。

trans-unit.target: 一个 Visual Basic 6.0 <see langword="Variant" />，其中包含 <see langword="ADODB.Connection" /> 对象。

trans-unit.target: <see langword="ADODB.Connection" /> 对象的集合。

trans-unit.source: When an application is upgraded to [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)], a `BaseDataEnvironment` is created to enable the ADO-related code.
trans-unit.target: 在应用程序升级到[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]、`BaseDataEnvironment`创建以启用 ADO 相关代码。

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources that are used by a <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseDataEnvironment" />, and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: 释放由 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseDataEnvironment" /> 使用的非托管资源，也可以释放托管资源。

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources that are used by a <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseDataEnvironment" />.
trans-unit.target: 释放由 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseDataEnvironment" /> 占用的非托管资源。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 此方法称为由公共`Dispose()`方法和<xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <see langword="false" /> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: 若要释放托管资源和非托管资源，则为 <see langword="true" />；若仅释放非托管资源，则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources that are used by a <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseDataEnvironment" />, and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: 释放由 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseDataEnvironment" /> 使用的非托管资源，也可以释放托管资源。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 此方法称为由公共`Dispose()`方法和<xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: `Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the disposing parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose()` 调用受保护`Dispose(Boolean)`方法释放参数设置为`true`。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with the disposing parameter set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> 调用`Dispose`释放参数设置为`false`。

trans-unit.source: When the disposing parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this control references.
trans-unit.target: 当处置参数是`true`，此方法释放由该控件引用任何托管对象持有的全部资源。

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: 此方法调用每个引用对象的 `Dispose()` 方法。

trans-unit.source: Overrides the <see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 重写 <see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: When an application is upgraded to [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)], a `BaseDataEnvironment` is created to enable the ADO-related code.
trans-unit.target: 在应用程序升级到[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]、`BaseDataEnvironment`创建以启用 ADO 相关代码。

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="String" /> that contains an <see langword="ADODB.Command" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see langword="String" />，其中包含一个 <see langword="ADODB.Command" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: A GUID representing an <see langword="ADODB.Recordset" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示 <see langword="ADODB.Recordset" /> 对象的 GUID。

trans-unit.source: Invokes a method based on an <see langword="ADODB.Command" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 基于 <see langword="ADODB.Command" /> 对象调用方法。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that contains the <see langword="ADODB.Command" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Object" />，其中包含 <see langword="ADODB.Command" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: When an application is upgraded to [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)], a `BaseDataEnvironment` is created to enable the ADO-related code.
trans-unit.target: 在应用程序升级到[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]、`BaseDataEnvironment`创建以启用 ADO 相关代码。

trans-unit.source: Gets a count of <see langword="ADODB.Command" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see langword="ADODB.Command" /> 对象的计数。

trans-unit.source: An <see langword="Integer" /> that contains the count.
trans-unit.target: 一个包含计数的 <see langword="Integer" />。

trans-unit.source: Only `ADODB.Command` objects that do not return an `ADODB.Recordset` are counted.
trans-unit.target: 仅`ADODB.Command`不返回的对象`ADODB.Recordset`进行计数。

trans-unit.source: When an application is upgraded to [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)], a `BaseDataEnvironment` is created to enable the ADO-related code.
trans-unit.target: 在应用程序升级到[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]、`BaseDataEnvironment`创建以启用 ADO 相关代码。

trans-unit.source: Not applicable.
trans-unit.target: 不适用。

trans-unit.source: This method is not implemented in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseDataEnvironment" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 此方法未在 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseDataEnvironment" /> 类中实现。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="Nothing" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Nothing" />。
